column4: I have one static and one dhcp interface. I want that the "gateway" of the dhcp interface should take effect, but it always picks that of the static ip address
any idea how to fix this?
how are you setting the static interface?
here is my sample interfaces file http://pastebin.com/m6450780b
my gateway always shows up as 192.168.1.1 instead of that received with the eth0 dhcp
are you using regular ubuntu or ubuntu-sever?

okay, then the network-manager should be used to set the interface static, not the interfaces file - as soon as you edit interfaces file, network-manager won't touch it

if you're going to use only the /etc/network/interfaces file, then you don't need NetworkManager
you can use one or the other, but not both
